Plot: Eleven year old Lukas and his mother have come into the house of the dying grandfather to bid him farewell. Lukas is confused. He loves his grandfather, but refuses to say goodbye. At night he is awakened by strange sounds in the old house. Footsteps are approaching. Slowly his bedroom door opens...
Title: Der Abschied
Actors: Jakob Ahrends, Joscha Blankenburg, Martin Eckermann, Sandra Nedeleff
